Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces

Interface LocaleSpecificTextGetter

public interface LocaleSpecificTextGetter

This interface describes any locale-specific entities (usually GUI items). It uses in conjunction with the LocaleResource and LocaleResourceLocation annotations. You can associate any locale-specific resources with any entity, that implements this interface, and it's content and tool tip will refresh automatically on locale changes.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
Localizer, LocaleResource

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getLocaleSpecificText()
    Get locale-specific text for the entity
    java.lang.String getLocaleSpecificToolTipText()
    Get locale-specific tool tip text for the entity.

  • Method Details

    • getLocaleSpecificText

      java.lang.String getLocaleSpecificText()

      Get locale-specific text for the entity

      Returns:
      locale-specific text to gotten. This parameter is not a key to seek localization resource, but value found

    • getLocaleSpecificToolTipText

      java.lang.String getLocaleSpecificToolTipText()

      Get locale-specific tool tip text for the entity.

      Returns:
      locale-specific tool tip text gotten. This parameter is not a key to seek localization resource, but value found
